idinfo.useconst:
For use at 1:2400 or smaller scale.
For educational/demonstration purposes only. The Originator, Publisher and Distributor exclude any and all implied warranties and make no warranty or representation with respect to the data files or accompanying documentation, including quality, performance, merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose. These data files and documentation are provided 'as is' and the User assumes the entire risk as to their quality and performance
These data are not to be redistributed for commercial profit. Reproduction or redistribution of this digital data set without permission of the Originator/Publisher is expressly forbidden. The Originator and Publisher should be clearly cited in any product derived from this data. Any modifications to this data must be described in any digital or hardcopy product derived from this data.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 4; ESRI ArcCatalog 8.3.0.800

dataqual.logic: Topology exists for coverage. The same number of polygons exist in the exported shapefile. No polygon overlap.

horizpa.horizpar: Accuracy conforms to National Mapping Accuracy Standards of planimetric and topographic mapping data at a design scale of 1"=200'.

procstep.procdesc: Features digitized from aerial photography. Supplemented and revised by Lancaster GIS staff from information gathered through assessment, fieldwork and surveys.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

distinfo.distliab: Not for commercial use or resale. The User shall save Lancaster County, the Commonwealth and the Pennsylvania State University harmless from any suits, claims or actions arising out of the use of the data files or accompanying documentation, or arising out of any defect in the data files or accompanying documentation. Lancaster County, the Commonwealth and the Pennsylvania State University excludes any and all implied warranties and makes no warranty or representation with respect to the data files or accompanying documentation, including quality, performance, merchantability, or fitness for a particular purpose. These data files and documentation are provided AS IS and the User assumes the entire risk as to their quality and performance.

stdorder.fees: $65/MB for commercial use; $13/MB for non-profit uses plus $40/hr handling fee (minimum one hour) and media fees $1 for 3.5 floppy and $10 for CDROM
stdorder.ordering: Complete instructions and forms available from http://www.co.lancaster.pa.us/GIS.htm

stdorder.nondig: Hard copy maps can be ordered and created from Lancaster County GIS
stdorder.fees:
8 1/2" x 11" - $5 11" x 17" - $25
Standard map 33 1/2" x 45" - $75; discount rate $50 Mylar map 33 1/2" x 45" - $100; discount rate $75
Custom maps available at a charge of $40/hr.
Copies of existing maps $25.00
stdorder.ordering: Acquire, complete and return Map Request form available at: http://www.co.lancaster.pa.us/GISforms.htm

distinfo.custom: Complete instructions and forms available from http://www.co.lancaster.pa.us/GIS.htm
